<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-08-03 05:34:18" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2013-06-04 03:45:30" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATE_SYMLINK" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_scripts.description: Execute the Steam Update using your steam account.
tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
@echo off
SET STEAMFOLDER=%TCAdminFolder%\Monitor\Tools\SteamCmd SET STEAMSCRIPT=tmp%ThisService_ServiceId%.txt
IF %ThisService_IsSteamGuardRequest%==0 GOTO STEAMUPDATE
:STEAMGUARD echo Requesting steam guard code for %ThisService_SteamAccount%... echo @ShutdownOnFailedCommand 1 >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo @NoPromptForPassword 1 >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo login "%ThisService_SteamAccount%" "%ThisService_SteamPassword%" >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo exit >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%"
"%STEAMFOLDER%\steamcmd.exe" +runscript "%STEAMSCRIPT%" +exit > null echo. echo The code has been requested. Check the email account associated with your steam account.
GOTO END
:STEAMUPDATE echo @ShutdownOnFailedCommand 1 > "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo @NoPromptForPassword 1 >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo set_steam_guard_code "%ThisService_SteamGuardCode%" >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo login "%ThisService_SteamAccount%" "%ThisService_SteamPassword%" >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo force_install_dir "%ThisService_RootDirectory%" >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo app_update 215350 validate >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%" echo exit >> "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%"
"%STEAMFOLDER%\steamcmd.exe" +runscript "%STEAMSCRIPT%"
GOTO END
:END del /q "%STEAMFOLDER%\%STEAMSCRIPT%"
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2013-06-28 16:22:29" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2013-08-04 18:01:10" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>
